Title: The people's hearts are very happy
Designer: Yantai Light Industry Academy (烟台轻工业学校)Liu Qingxiao (刘庆孝)Lu Sunli (鹿孙里)
Publisher: Shandong renmin chubanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: The children are looking at a statuette of a scene from the Chinese classical novel Journey to the West, Monkey beating the White Bone Demon. Suddenly appearing often on posters from 1977-1978, this scene may be assumed to refer to the downfall of Mao's wife/widow Jiang Qing and her Gang of Four. The scene takes place at the Summer Palace in Beijing (Yihe yuan, 北京颐和园).
